attributes.additional_details:
Citizenship. We, the undersigned, urge the immediate establishment of a compulsory British citizenship course.  Each person in Britain shall be a citizen. This shall be achieved by undergoing a compulsory citizenship course. All persons leaving school shall be eligible.  All immigrants shall be eligible retrospectively. All unemployed shall be eligible retrospectively.

The course shall deliver; English language training, respect for rule of law, fellow citizens and communal property, training for employment.

Benefits; multiculturism will be addressed, all but the totally incapable will be accommodated and removed from benefits, skill shortages can be addressed, climate change can be prepared for and entrepreneurs can be identified and encouraged.
